title: Accidentally disenchanted my skin HELP
body:
today I got Yasuo nightbringer skin after spending 20pound in the game rerolled the skin, that I got from the chest and ended up with nightbringer Yasuo.
And fact that I didn't have the champion, so I was going to buy the champion without realizing that I don t have enough BE. And accidentally disenchanting the skin. Is there any way that I can get undo the disenchantment? I m fine if I lose the orange essence form disenchantment.   Help pls.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They may or may not be able to help you, and it's up to their discretion even if they can. If it's happened before they likely won't.
Thank You I hope I get it back
